review: We love it!But the remote is soooooo small. It gets lost all the time.  My toddler loves to grab it and hide it. Had to buy a replacement remote for $25.  But the product works great (and even the replacement remote works great... just take out of box, point, and it works.)
author: LACbuyer

review: We love our Apple TV!  Super easy to set up, as with most Apple items, pretty much plug and play.  I have an external hard drive I copied all of our movies onto and we use our Apple TV rather than shuffling around DVD's.  With a 3 year old that constantly wants one of her disney movies playing this sure does simplify my world!  My DVD boxes are all put away in the closet, DVD player hardly gets used.  I haven't really tried a lot of the other functions (Netflix etc.), but it does exactly what I bought it for.
author: Ultimate Amazon Mom

review: The AppleTV is a great buy for those families that have a lot of Apple products. We love it and would gladly recommend it.

review: I have had several AppleTVs and they are a seriously excellent way to get content.  If you have a lot of iTunes content already, they are even better.  Only drawback is no access to Vudu or Amazon.
author: T. Scot "Mama Scot"

review: Well my girlfriend and I love Apple TV so this is our second purchase. We got one for the living room then got really tired of moving it into the bedroom so... we got a second. If you are tired of paying a ridiculous amount of money for a s*** ton of channels that you never watch this may be for you. Apple TV provides fairly inexpensive access to all the various TV shows and movies that we want. Its about $16 a month for hulu and netflix then whatever we spend on iTunes renting movies. For us it comes out to much less than the easily $100 plus that we were paying xfinity for a bunch of annoying channels we never watched. If you are the type of person who likes to watch every brain melting tv show out there and can't handle having a few moments of quite while you pick out your next show or movie then maybe steer clear... I dunno, just get one anyway
author: Foxtrot87
